item.title: Control
item.description:
According to HowLongToBeat it takes 11.5 hours (13 hours on Ultimate Edition) to beat, and I am 10.3 hours in. I should go ahead and finish it.

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description:
A ton of fun, but we never ended up picking it up as a friend group and playing the single player piece at the computer is not as fun as it would be in the living room.

item.title: Dominion

Board Games

  • Dominion
    • Recommended by Jake Keneally
    • Fantastic. One of my favorite card games ever

item.title: Pandemic
item.description:
• Pandemic
    • Recommended by Jake
    • Played it.
    • It’s only okay.
    • It’s basically a Forbidden Island for adults

item.title: Harry Potter Hogwart's Battle
item.description:
Board Games

  • Harry Potter Hogwarts Battle Pros

    • Simple

    • Easy to Pick Up

    • The location counters changing the difficulty feels really cool (Basically becomes different phases of the game) Cons

    • Only basic mechanics

    • No way to break the game (feels grindy)

    • The fact the villains don’t attack you feels anti-climactic

    • The cards you choose to draft don’t significantly change your outcome

    • No real tradeoff decisions when drafting cards

    • Cards stick around instead of having a limited window with which to purchase them.

item.title: Betrayal at house on the hill
